sentences.sentence: He called on the leaders of Somali society to persuade pirates operating off the coast of the Horn of Africa to stop hijacking ships for ransom.
sentences.translation: 他呼吁索马里社会的领导人规劝在非洲之角沿海地区活动的海盗停止为赎金劫持船只。

sentences.sentence: It says piracy and the hijacking of ships off the Somali coast also is adding to the emergency.
sentences.translation: 儿童基金会说，索马里沿海地区的海盗和劫持船只事件也使得该地区儿童的境况更加紧急。
